description: Deletes the MSK cluster specified by the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) in the request.

parameters.name: ClusterArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the cluster. The possible states are ACTIVE, CREATING, DELETING, FAILED, HEALING, MAINTENANCE, REBOOTING_BROKER, and UPDATING.
